DownloadÂ¶

Installation of the package only requires to download the archive file below and run the functions within the PAGO directory that will be created, or add the directory to MATLAB path.

Appropriate links to the MATLAB toolboxes are expected (see Requirements for more details).

Please inform us of any bugs or necessary improvements. see Contact

Users of the package may acknowledge this website . See How to cite
